item.description:
Sep 21 - Latin Social Dance Party!

Party Includes an all-levels lesson - Rumba, followed by general dancing including salsa, cha-cha, rumba, samba, bachata, swing, and more. ABL provides  complementary wine, food, coffee, pastries…

Mention "MEET-UP" and receive a discount.

Call ABL at 508-925-4537

The party will be at ABL Dance Center - near White City Shopping Plaza, Rt. 9 in Shrewsbury, MA. at Maironis Park on Lake Quinsigamond. - Upper Level.

Lesson starts at 7:10pm.  - The lesson normally starts off simply with easy basics and usually moves into something more challenging for experienced dancers.

Dancing at 8:00.

For details check: http://americanballroomlatin.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me after the lesson - the folks at the desk can point me out to you. Also - I have been printing out a meetup sign to put on one of the tables to give us a place to gather.

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Third Friday Latin Dance Lounge
